product_name: CamelBak Octane 22 LR Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Octane 22 LR Hydration Pack offers a balanced, comfortable fit and generous capacity for a full day of hydration while hiking, adventure racing or trail running. 100 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) lumbar reservoir features a welded center baffle and low-profile shape for stability. Quick Link(TM) system lets you effortlessly add accessories such as a Fresh(TM) filter, insulated tube, tube director or flow meter (accessories sold separately). Horizontally positioned hydration compartment loads easily, holding the reservoir flat against your back. Wide-mouth port makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Reservoir is taste-free, easy to clean and easy to fill via the large opening. Back panel with breathable mesh enhances ventilation and comfort. Hipbelt and shoulder belts have pockets for snacks and often-used essentials. The CamelBak Octane 22 LR Hydration Pack features an overflow pocket on the front panel that can hold extra layers or a helmet.
short_description: The CamelBak Octane 22 LR Hydration Pack offers a balanced, comfortable fit and generous capacity for a full day of hydration while hiking, adventure racing or trail running.
